name: bsod_report
short_description:
It can creates reports.
1. Report drivers.txt contains information about drivers (version, valid sign, name, path and so on).
2. Report dt.txt contains information about beginning and the end of work.
3. Report bios.txt contains information about BIOS.
4. Report operatingsystem.txt contains information about system.
5. Report osrecoveryconfig.txt contains information about system recovery options.
6. Report apps.txt contains information about installed applications.
7. Report videocontroller.txt contains information about installed video adapters (driver version and date, device ID).
8. Report volumes.txt contains information about volumes.
9. Creating backup copy of Application and System event logs.
10. Creating copy of minidump files.
11. Creating ZIP archive file of directory that contains all these reports and minidump files.
Some of reports designed for analyzing in Excel, for example drivers.txt.
summary: Application designed to make easier analyzing BSOD
